reviews.review: Macht echt spaß jede zweite runde auf hacker zu treffen
Игра просто бомбическая, играю каждый день, прям завлекает очень хорошо что в steam есть такая шикарная игра
Fucking best game in the world

Since I am almost only playing this game, u might think that I enjoy this game every single second.  Sadly this wish has come to a massive decrease lately since the Teammates are getting more and more "unuseable" in a way and Cheating is still a huuuuuge factor why many people leave the game. It is CS the best and worst game in the world at the same time and it often is a love and Hate relationship at the same time. I recommend everyone trying, but dont let it ruin your day because of some toxic TEammates or enemys.

Good game, first of its kind and has community maps when you get bored of the base game, this game supports a lot of play styles and i highly recommend,  my favourite community mode is surf and i advise you give it a try
Игра говно но лучше ее нету пиздец
挂很多官匹上分机制垃圾的鸭皮，萌新建议直接玩平台虽然也有但是比官匹好多了
Ho scoperto del fuoco amico all'ultimo round alla mia prima competitive, beh che dire ban 30 minuti ma molto emozionante questa prima esperienza
